name: Save The President (waymoor)
description:
Alien invasion is imminent and you are in control of Tax Payer! Carry The President to safety at all costs!

Tax Payer has strong muscular arms and can use them to his advantage in creative ways, mostly by picking up and throwing various objects.

Controls

WASD and arrows to move

> Space to pick up and throw objects

> E to interact

> R to reset level

Credits

> Programming - elq and unityyyy

> Music - EddieTheCubeHead and elq

> Graphics - AXLplosion
